newFeatures.feature: Added release notes page for users and developers to track new features

bugFixes.bug: Users can now submit words with capital or lowercase letters, the checking is no longer case sensitive.
Users are no longer allowed to submit numeric values to the global daily game.

improvements.improvement: Icon color and size styling is improved on the release notes page.

additionalResources.additionalResource: View the release notes page for reference at: https://thewordguessgame.com/releaseNotes
